name: SideQuests - The Game
description:
IMPORTANT: The game is completable in it's current state, but I didn't have enough time to add all the content I wanted to. I plan on updating the game over the rating period. 

CONTROLS: WASD for moving and jumping. 

STORY: A strange purple person has recruited you, more or less against your will, to pretend to be a hero. All he wants is some side quests, so go around and collect them all! Careful though, this hero costume is homemade, which could lead to some complications.
